snippet: India's Sahara conglomerate said on Friday it aimed to raise $650 million in loans to secure the release of its chief, in jail for nearly nine months over the group's failure to refund billions of dollars to investors in outlawed bonds....

headline.print_headline: Jailed Indian Tycoon Looks to Raise $650 Million Loan to Fund Bail
headline.main: Jailed Indian Tycoon Looks to Raise $650 Million Loan to Fund Bail

lead_paragraph: India's Sahara conglomerate said on Friday it aimed to raise $650 million in loans to secure the release of its chief, in jail for nearly nine months over the group's failure to refund billions of dollars to investors in outlawed bonds.
